name: Robot War - Modern Battle
description:
Rush into the world filled with robotic creatures, futuristic droids, and cyber men being a commander of your own large robot army! Control your war units tapping the screen and place them all in the right positions to be the real winner of this war! Power your strategic skills up playing Robot War - Modern Battle game!

Robot War - Modern Battle features:
• Futuristic robots epic battle simulator
• Chance to lead the whole titans’ army
• Interesting units – from various dd to the healers
• Complete two game modes’ missions – skirmish and the campaign ones
• Power your tactics and strategy apps
• Enjoy simple and intuitive controls
• Watch epic 3D battlefield from above

Play this amazing Robot War - Modern Battle game and become a real commander for all these stunning robotic creatures in the world of future!
